page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT, West Cambs.
page.content:
Villages contain surprising amount of talent, musically and drama/crafts. Catworth - 1950-54 pantomime performed for charity. 1980s local actress produ ced 'Old Time Music Hall' Evening. Social evenings/coffee mornings held for fund raising
Nearest cinemas Huntingdon (re-opened 1980s), Bedford (Victoria - converted about 1980 to 2 smaller cinemas), Pet- erborough (Odeon and ABC, 3 screens each), Cambridge (Arts + Victoria/ABC 2 screens each) Theatres - coach parties visit London, Peterborough (Key), Cambridge (Arts, ADC), Northampton (Derngate/Royal)
